    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="50384" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="50384" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.99</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="13857">13,857</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="2587"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Cloud</b> by <b>Ariana Grande</b> is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. <b>Cloud</b> was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Clement Gavarry. Top notes are Lavender, Pear and Bergamot; middle notes are Whipped Cream, Coconut, Praline and Vanilla Orchid; base notes are Musk and Woody Notes. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a                     </div>
                    Performance is not great
                </div>

            </div>
                    <div class="carousel-cell-photo">
                <div style="position: relative;padding-top: 100%">

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="50384"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.8594681029756; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 3.075rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81007176538254; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.182.jpg" style="width: 2.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pear-182.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pear</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.454.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cream-454.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Whipped Cream</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98399898399848; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.138.jpg" style="width: 3.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Coconut-138.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Coconut</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98070561712475; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.198.jpg" style="width: 3.85rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Praline-198.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Praline</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.77716431896851; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.154.jpg" style="width: 2.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orchid-154.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla Orchid</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90318300578584; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 3.325rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81007176538254; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.315.jpg" style="width: 2.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Woody-Notes-315.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Woody Notes</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="50384"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='6a0e1b3ea659e002aa81c7592fa8a5e1192' slotpayload='{"ct":"1xCQRQUhAd7P5Ndh7Sef9GXDulxTbJODnFnyfpEqHhLN7jubtt4lj7MFLaMUV85Zjkkw6ulJGcJjO76sMpwVzWHA1623A4NvNvEwWQIjglnU8wHXHf+raZmFHOLjy7AmQB+anAJ3HORL9iAPzpY8Z6QTefJAawkWZ0JfGTmXkxixnpyFVq7Gg1Cmkt5w0p7h5x57BZX5TAN6XDS0I2eOhSSQylbLtzvwsWxJAvu60qIch2KLwEWnyJl0g0xz41cwYtQe8\/t+HQ0kzcaPxuR9prhAoA6YE79ceU35nJKMVTk45BDI70ee01n+M0FtaSaQ","iv":"c6160804ca03a917bbfdfd1e451a2d42","s":"eeb7c9eef4d5ce5b"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

</div><more-related-news load_more_title="Load more" :perfume_id="50384" :count_news="14" :previous_loaded="10"></more-related-news></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="50384"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.08</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="50384"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.14</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4" v-pre>

</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem;     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371292" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sennie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1901378.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sennie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901378">sennie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733375848" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>doesn't smell anything like br540 at all, used to think it was sickly sweet but not anymore<br />
still can't smell coconut but the vanilla creme/musk is good, and the lavender is minimal</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2371292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2371292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371099" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mansisri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2348218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mansisri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2345532">mreclz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733349605" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i used to love this one (signature scent for like 4 years) and its was just to good, i always received compliments bc it literally smelled amazing but know i feel like everybody has it and i maybe just grown out of this scent but its a 10/10 for the price, maybe i should try out the pink one</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2370937"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2370937#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370930" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Christelstahls"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2348073"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2348073.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Christelstahls" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2348073">Christelstahls</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733349180" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had this as my signature scent for a couple of years, until I (sadly) just got tired of it one day. To me its very similar to Baccarat Rouge, but just a little softer and lighter, slightly more feminine vibe. I used to LOVE the burnt sugary, whipped cream goodness and reapplied it several times a day just for the joy of it. I hope I will get back into the obsession soon, because it was a dream!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2370930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2370930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369302" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="girlblogger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771509"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1771509.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="girlblogger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/TriBeCa-59904.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59904.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="TriBeCa"title="TriBeCa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369302ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369302" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771509">girlblogger</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733242754" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cloud is a classic in my collection. It has its own unique scent, but definitely does have some strong similarities to MFKs Baccarat Rouge here and there. People say Cloud is a scent for younger ages but honestly I think its very ageless. Its tastefully sweet, floral, musky, woodyIm very particular about fragrances and I dont like anything that has too much of one (too sweet or strong, too floral or light, too musky or heavily masculine) and I think Cloud was done perfectly to meet in the middle of sweet, floral, and musky/woody. This is the most used fragrance in my collection. Its very versatile, and I also think the price point is great, especially considering the fragrances that are popular right now within the fragrance community. Paired it with Versace Eros once (it was life changing).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2369302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2369302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366543" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="littlesparks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1877348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1877348.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="littlesparks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1877348">littlesparks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 18:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was nose blind to this/it was too weak until it sat for around 6 months. Now I can actually smell and appreciate how cute this is! I cant smell a single bit of coconut, but the lavender is precious and well balanced, it isnt cold or sharp! Just perfect in a total girl-next-door easy peasy, sweet and clean crowd pleaser. I feel like I could smell this on a hundred people out and about and love it every time!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2366543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2366543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366001" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A very basic masculine scent. Somehow, it reminds me of the dentist. I cant smell the pear, whipped cream and praline. I thought this would be more gourmandy but its not. Its a masculine dentist office scent, Im sorry!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2366001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2366001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365653" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shakyharrison"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1562925"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1562925.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shakyharrison" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Natura/Kriska-Delirio-63019.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63019.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kriska Delrio"title="Kriska Delrio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1562925">shakyharrison</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 22:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You all need to STOP saying this smells like Baccarat Rouge. Because it smells NOTHING like it. This smells like most of the notes listed here: whipped cream, a bit of coconut,a bit of pear and a very noticeable lavender. But nothing to do with the saffron, jasmin,ambroxane of BR540.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2365653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2365653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364031" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Paradiso26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2034325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Paradiso26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ga-De/Icon-Musk-Oil-38631.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38631.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Icon Musk Oil"title="Icon Musk Oil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034325">Paradiso26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 09:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this was love at first sniff . <br />
<br />
I couldn't figure out what got my attention. What got me to love this was the contrast between the lavender  and  coconut whipped cream , this was the first time I've ever liked lavender because to me lavender is a spa scent and it's kind of masculine or unisex .<br />
 But here the lavender was so likable. <br />
 interestingly sweet. Love it <br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
 .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2364031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2364031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472793">dodo777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-27">11/27/24 01:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>been wearing this again recently and i'm sorry but (if you're into sweet stuff) this is a banger of epic proportions !!!!! i wish people would let go of the "is it a dupe for BR 540" because WE GET IT omg it's a cheap similar-but-not-really - i just think it doesn't need to be compared to oblivion to be enjoyed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2362665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2362665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361827" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361827" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iammelody"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/635492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.635492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iammelody" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Bare-Vanilla-56836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bare Vanilla"title="Bare Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361827ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361827" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/635492">iammelody</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this but it's not a love for me. This isn't the fragrance's fault, but I'm a returning uni student and I smell this everywhere. I bought Cloud without testing first, not realizing that THIS is what I've been smelling everywhere. Smelling this on it's own now makes me think of packed metro cars, crowded spaces and stress over assignments and exams (lol). I think it's nice paired with other sweet scents ( I like to use it with BBW's Cotton Candy Clouds cream), but on it's own its just okay - that is, if I remove the association with school stress. <br />
<br />
Separating the fragrance from the association, I think it's a cute, sweet and fluffy smell that's meant to be happy and comforting. As someone who despises lavender, I'm glad it only makes an appearance in the opening and doesn't stick around. The musk, whipped cream, praline and woodiness is what's left after the top cools down. <br />
I should mention that I never smelled BR540 so I don't have that to compare it with. I've tried Burberry Her and I don't think they're alike. <br />
Once my bottle is gone though, it's going to stay gone unless by some miracle I start missing it and want it back.<br />
<br />
Edit: I find it addictive now. Great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2361827"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2361827#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; ROUGE 540! They are not twin sisters, they are 3rd cousins. She has the 540 dna but cloud is way too lactonic and sweet to be a complete dupe. If you want a sweeter, creamier Bac. rouge. This is her. But they are not the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2361538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2361538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357311" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sugarpine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2332063"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2332063.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sugarpine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2332063">sugarpine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 02:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i've repurchased this several times and is by far the best ariana grande scent! its a beautifully sweet scent with light fruity notes and not overpowering at all</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2357311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2357311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356570" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356570" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="veraciousvices"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2226610.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="veraciousvices" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Elixir-78581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Elixir"title="Angel Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356570ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356570" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226610">veraciousvices</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 09:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am not an Ariana Grande fan, BUT I feel like Cloud is the 2020s version of Britney Spears's Fantasy, so when I saw this at Walgreen's for $31.99 (1 oz), I had to try it! To me, this lives up to the hype. I have not smelled the real BR540, but I've smelled many of the "dupes"/"scents for less," and Cloud is my favorite one that I've tried. To me, the biggest difference between Cloud and the other BR540 scents is Cloud is (1) sweeter and (2) less ambroxan (still a decent amount, but not a nose-burning amount). Cloud is very synthetic - not in a bad way, but in a way that means you've never actually smelled these notes in nature. The opening is a sharp, herbal-type scent, however, I would not be able to categorize it as lavender. As it dries down, you'll start to get the whipped cream and praline, I smell coconut in the sense that it's creamy, but definitely not a tropical type coconut. In the end, I get sweetened whipped cream + sharp ambroxan, and I love it! It lasts ~7 hours on skin (becomes less potent as time goes on), and strong sillage (you won't be able to smell the scent constantly, but you will smell it as you move around). It lasts FOREVER on clothes, potentially even through washing, depending on the fabric. I personally really like it, and I am happy with this blind buy purchase! However, if you are someone who doesn't like this what has become a ubiquitous scent profile (BR540), you would not like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2356570"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2356570#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354179" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Haileyfragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327880"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2327880.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Haileyfragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354179ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354179" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); Straight up smells like rubbing alcohol, more plastic than the ocean and a doctors office??? I do not recommend to anyone. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243904">Joyandsparklesx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 18:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very sweet and similar to br540. The coconut is very evident but not tropical,  more of a coconut cake type of vibe.  If you prefer a sweeter version of this , try thank you next by ariana.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2352481"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2352481#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348794" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stxbee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2038526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stxbee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038526">stxbee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 09:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it, but it's not for me.<br />
<br />
It smells exactly as if you put a bunch of warm cookies in a paper bag, let them rest for an hour, take the cookies out and smell the bag. If you like that smell, then this is for you :)<br />
<br />
I ended up buying a dupe, which did fulfill my expectations for a gourmand.<br />
Not bad, a bit overpriced for what it offers, but not wrong either. Definitely a people pleaser!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2348794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2348794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347187" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347187" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ahri_Yes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1430672"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1430672.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ahri_Yes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347187ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347187" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1430672">Ahri_Yes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 23:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You know what, I DO NOT agree with the majority of the comments. <br />
<br />
People saying that this isn't similar to Baccarat Rouge 540 definitely has a fake AG Cloud bottle or such because HELL this smells just like Baccarat Rouge 540. Honestly, the praline and coconut here is mellow and only appears in the dry down. In my initial spray all I got was BR540 and was pleasantly surprised. Now I get why many people say this is a BR540 clone because IT IS. <br />
<br />
BR540 sure is woody and a bit spicy in the initial spray but once it mellows down it smells 90% to AG Cloud. What I don't get is both perfumes have vastly different notes but when smelled side to side they are VERY similar. You'd get it if you have both bottles and please don't buy dupes/fake ones because they tend to water down the original scent of the perfume. In all transparency, I actually DID buy an AG cloud duper and BR 540 dupe, actually a lot from different local/mini brands, and trust me when I say this, they ALL have the OG scents wrong! <br />
<br />
Talking about the pear in this fragrance, I get NONE of it at all, I smell something metallic and amber like and if you're telling me that those notes are "light and airy", bro get your nose fixed because the packaging of this fragrance and the name could change your mind into thinking you smell these notes when in reality you're smelling something else. The power of packaging, colors, marketing and initial thinking can easily trick your mind. <br />
<br />
If you want BR540 but only the dry down, this is an EXACT dupe of it. What you're smelling is NOT creamy, it's amber and sugar. You're not smelling pear/bergamot you're smelling tree resin and iodine. I did not believe people at first when they said this smelled like BR540 because the notes are so far form each other but JUST smell it and you will see they are VERY similar. <br />
<br />
If you don't like BR540 like me, just get Sweet Like Candy however that kind of has a "saliva" note to it or air freshener note so maybe get REM instead. I like this fragrance because it is cheap compared to other fragrances but wearing BR540 can really be nose heavy and everyone already smells like it. Nothing unique about this and I'd suggest just get a different AG perfume. <br />
<br />
P.S. this perfume is definitely a Spring-Fall fragrance. Wearing it in hot weather or summer can be a bit cloying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2347187"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2347187#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346984" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gourmand_divaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2319929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2319929.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gourmand_divaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2319929">gourmand_divaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yes! This is one of Ari's BEST fragrances and sets itself apart from her earlier perfumes. It's a real crowd pleaser and. popular for a reason! I have to admit that it really doesn't last. I can maybe get an  hour or two from this. On the bright side, during those couple of hours it has pretty good silage. It smells like a softer version of mod vanilla with lots of  lavender. So fresh and the bottle is super pretty! I love this in all seasons, day or night, but perhaps more of a day scent? I will repurchase this over and over because it's so soft and iconic!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2346984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2346984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892682">doll.punk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 06:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>of all the AG frags ive tried, this is my favourite. ive been meaning to write a review for a while but the opening has always left me feeling a bit disappointed and i never got around to giving it a proper go. after reading the other reviews i expected the creamy, milky vanilla of my dreams but upon first spray it was always kinda screechy and too floral (?) for my taste. after letting it sit and dry down for a while, i can finally say its everything i hoped it would be. all throughout winter i was wearing sweet tooth by sabrina carpenter but am finding its a bit too cloying for the warmer weather, but this is the perfect creamy vanilla for the summertime, i think. it dries down to this wonderful lactonic sweet milk fragrance and im really enjoying it! for the price point id say its excellent and its a pretty safe blind buy in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340327" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="casualperfumeenjoyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2312181"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2312181.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="casualperfumeenjoyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340327ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340327" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2312181">casualperfumeenjoyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 18:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>if this is a br540 dupe then br540 smells NARSTY. just got a travel size and it is distractingly synthetic/plasticky/i don't know enough about perfume but theres something off about it that makes it smell very flat and depressing. when i wear it i feel like a credit card. currently trying out maceration to see if that mellows it out and allows for the vanilla/pear/bergamot notes to come through, so i'll check back in in a month LOL</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2340327"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2340327#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340151" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340151" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rinfumi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2117518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rinfumi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340151ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340151" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2117518">rinfumi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 14:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really feminine, gourmand, and lovely. my one problem is the projection is not that great at all. i recommend you overspray this alot. otherwise a stunning scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2340151"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2340151#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338910" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="archerries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2057645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="archerries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645">archerries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Although I usually avoid gourmand scents, this one is heavenly. It opens with a juicy, crisp pear notea personal favoritelayered with hints of citrus from bergamot. These fresh top notes soon evolve into a creamy coconut paradise, creating a lush sweetness.<br />
<br />
As the fragrance develops, a blend of nutty, chocolate praline and whipped cream adds a delicious, dessert-like quality. It has just enough sweetness to invite comparisons to Baccarat Rouge 540, although they are entirely different scents. Where BR540 has a burnt caramel syrup sweetness, Cloud is more like sweet cream and granulated white sugar: soft, airy, and light.<br />
<br />
The base notes of musk and woody tones add depth, ensuring that the fragrance doesnt become overly sweet or cloying. This grounding effect balances the scent and gives it a hint of sophistication.<br />
<br />
Cloud is a soft, fluffy, and youthful fragrance with a saccharine touch. It feels light and girlish without the excessive sweetness or intensity of many gourmands.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2338910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2338910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338378" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338378" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Forand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928128"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1928128.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Forand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338378ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338378" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333652" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Majoromantica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2305711"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2305711.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Majoromantica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);
