It's sweet, creamy, synthetic, airy, cold and sterile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2333652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2333652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332225" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332225" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leggo Eggo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2283041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leggo Eggo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kate-Spade/Kate-Spade-New-York-64401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kate Spade New York"title="Kate Spade New York"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283041">Leggo Eggo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 02:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my first ever perfume because of the price point and how many good reviews I've heard. It is such a sweet and girly perfume. I did not get much of the fruity notes, it felt more gourmand to me. <br />
The longevity and silage was amazing on me, lasting a full day and I was still able to smell when I went back home.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2332225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2332225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331750" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nonrom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228105"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1228105.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nonrom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Midnight-Fantasy-802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Fantasy"title="Midnight Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228105">nonrom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 14:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update: 1 year in and both my bottle and my decant (purchased from different retailers) have gone off.<br />
Very disappointing.<br />
No smell on this one now other than a faint whiff of coconut - asked my hubby and he agrees, it's gone off<br />
vs BR540 which still smells perfect to me.<br />
Ugh<br />
I was considering getting cloud pink and now I'm thinking not to, given how fast this has gone off.<br />
<br />
<br />
On my skin this is close to an exact dupe for BR 540  I have them both, and BR 540 smells slightly more expensive or perhaps well blended to my nose. But I have heard people say that cloud smells cheap to them  I dont think it smells cheap on me. Ive tested them with one on each wrist, and there are only very subtle differences  if I had to close my eyes I probably wouldnt be able to tell them apart. Definitely if I met a stranger wearing this, I wouldnt know if it was this or the original.<br />
I wore this non-stop for a few months last year  it was an easy wear. I thought it would be quite subtle and non-offensive, and therefore easy to wear everywhere.<br />
At the time, I could smell it quite clearly.<br />
Now however, after a few months gap, Ive tried it again  and I can barely smell it.perhaps I have somehow gone nose blind to it? Or my bottle has gotten worsened performance overtime? I will try layering with molecule one, and I will try my BR 540 again to see if Ive gone nose blind to that one as well.<br />
I completely understand the love and the hate for both these fragrances (they basically smell the same to/on me)  the fragrance is so likable to me, expensive and cosy and neither overly feminine nor masculine all at once. Distinctive.<br />
However, I hate that Almost everyone seems to be wearing this  which makes me hesitate to wear this to places/events that matter. Again, I hate to be that trend hater but I do want to smell a little bit different from every other person out there.<br />
Its definitely one of my more cosy/stress reducing smells though, its an easy wear and I hope my nose blindness to this goes away.<br />
I never got any of the medical antiseptic Type vibes, but there is a definite metallic undertone to it that I dont mind since the scent overall is well rounded and impressive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2331750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2331750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331398" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sinella.i"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sinella.i" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Le-Parfum-78427.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78427.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Le Parfum"title="Black Opium Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398494">sinella.i</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I keep hearing that this is the exact dupe for Baccarat Rouge 540. Can someone explain how? In my opinion there is absolutely nothing in common. I have Baccarat which is very strong, woody amber with chaffron. This, on the other hand, is light, airy, little bit of coconut. Not even the same scent family or any common notes.<br />
<br />
So who came up with the idea that these smell the same?? Or is it some inside joke?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2331398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2331398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2330667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330667" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sasch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2282649"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2282649.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sasch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2282649">sasch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 17:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was SO curious and intrigued to try this and had very high hopes from the numerous reviews.Sorry to share this opinion, but I feel the comparison of this, though dupe title, this is no where close to BR540 and feel regretfully disappointed this was overrated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2330667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2330667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329416" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arielxx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2301203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2301203.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arielxx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329416ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329416" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); The wildest one was at a pharmacy where the PHARMACIST asked me what perfume I had. For me and my skin, it leaves a solid trail for others to smell it too. I do highly recommend this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2329416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2329416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323517" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hysteria1988"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081331.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hysteria1988" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/L-Interdit-Eau-de-Parfum-Rouge-Ultime-83865.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83865.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime"title="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081331">hysteria1988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 01:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I picked up a bottle of this, i'd already left a review from when I first smelt it and it was like citrus kitchen cleaner mixed with bleach. More recently however, in the shop i smelt it again, completely different, more like what is described below and in the notes! really enjoyed it!<br />
<br />
After mulling it over i decided to pick up a 30ml as it was on offer, i've got it home and it smells completely different again!!! straight up floral and a bit musky.<br />
<br />
Im hoping this is an aging issue otherwise there is a serious issue with batches of this fragrance. I'll update this review in a while and see if the scent changes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2323517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2323517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Starliiie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941297"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1941297.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Starliiie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941297">Starliiie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 20:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cant see how people are obsessed with this because its such a musky masculine scent to me. I wish I could smell it as a more sweet girly perfume but I just cannot. Its such a bad smell in my opinion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2323342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2323342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322601" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="missk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7262"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.7262.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="missk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/DKNY-Be-Delicious-Fresh-Blossom-Juiced-11127.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11127.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="DKNY Be Delicious Fresh Blossom Juiced"title="DKNY Be Delicious Fresh Blossom Juiced"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322601ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322601" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7262">missk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ariana Grande Cloud is one of the more popular BR540 clones on the market, and for many years has had a cult following due to Ariana Grande's popularity as a singer/celebrity and the sheer affordability of this perfume in comparison to the original BR540.<br />
<br />
Cloud doesn't smell like BR540 immediately, in fact the opening is rather heavy on the alcohol and resembles more of a fluffy, sugary vanilla and pear blend on my skin for the first hour. The drydown is where the BR540 DNA becomes more apparent with notes of praline, ambroxan, whipped cream and musk increasing in intensity on warm skin. What sets Cloud apart from BR540 is the occasional wafts of lavender and coconut that provide a freshness that is missing from the original.<br />
<br />
BR540 not surprisingly has more finesse, but without disrespecting Cloud, this is a solid clone in a reasonable price range. The packaging is rather kitsch with a pale blue, rounded bottle encased in a cloud-shaped holder. You will either love the packaging or find it juvenile and cringey. I am unfortunately the latter.<br />
<br />
I admittedly prefer Armaf's Club de Nuit Untold as far as BR540 clones go but I do like the way Cloud has approached the BR540 DNA with a twist. Cloud is a firm favourite for many, often touted as one of her best fragrance releases. In terms of projection and longevity, Cloud lasts exceptionally well and is great value for money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2322601"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2322601#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321807" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="petalunique"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2271458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="petalunique" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-40-67527.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67527.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '40"title="Cheirosa '40"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); Appropriate for any occassion.<br />
<br />
Good sillage and longetivity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2321807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2321807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310270" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rosiewebber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rosiewebber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480732">Rosiewebber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 13:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really appreciate this ones similarities to BR540. I love the smell of that one but it pulls far too masculine on me. For me this is the feminine version, still that interesting sweet woodiness, but softer and creamier, with a hint of coconut. Im pleased with this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2310270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2310270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309512" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Missm7393"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2075138"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Missm7393" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-Arden/Green-Tea-83.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Tea"title="Green Tea"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309512ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309512" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2075138">Missm7393</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 21:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first fragrance I've smelt on someone and gone "Jesus Christ, I need to know what she's wearing". Well, this was it. <br />
<br />
This is a beautiful sweet, caramelly, coconutty, creamy and very slightly powdery scent. It's sweet without being overpoweringly so, and so it manages to stay classy and sophisticated. This is a crowd pleaser, and I've had many complements on it, however from other reviews I know it can be somewhat polarising so I'd recommend to try it before wear. <br />
<br />
It's a very popular scent, especially among young women, so don't expect to be the only one who wears this one. But it's a very beautiful scent, so I'm absolutely happy that everyone wears it. <br />
<br />
I've heard comparisons drawn between Cloud and BR540. I tried a sample of BR540, and did not like it, there was almost a minty scent to it, which made it pretty unpleasant. In my opinion Cloud smells far, far better than BR540, and is also honestly not similar enough to Baccarat Rouge to be considered a dupe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2309512"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2309512#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sweet and light. Good for any occasion. They only downside is that it doesnt last for very long.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2307464"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2307464#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306580" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="catonmars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1586123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="catonmars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-Exclusif-50370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina Exclusif"title="Delina Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586123">catonmars</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 05:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a headache-inducing sweet fragrance that I solely use for layering purposes to make fragrances sweeter. I would never wear this on its own since it smells very candy-like and synthetic, making it too childlike for my taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2306580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2306580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306425" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306425" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="littlesparks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1877348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1877348.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="littlesparks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306425ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306425" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1877348">littlesparks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 23:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had given this to someone who could clearly smell this while I could not (most BKR dupes are this way for me..). A few sprays from that same bottle, many months later, and not only could I smell it, but it lasted several hours!! I was shocked by how much I liked this, in contrast to the watery(read: weak) scent I smelled last year, this was coconutty, creamy and musky. Not getting the praline, but the lavender is VERY well blended, not becoming cold/sharpish on me as it often times does. I am a huge fan of Ariana Grande perfumes, their DNA is one of my favorite scents, and I can confidently say that this one and REM get so much better with age.<br />
<br />
I checked my purchase date of this, and it was August of last year. It was sprayed a few times then it sat till around Dec/Jan and was sprayed a handful more times I believe, but had sat untouched for around 5-6 months.<br />
, just to be clear how this was aged.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2306425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2306425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2261113">saarah18</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 17:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Truly a women's fragrance classic. It is extremely sweet and creamy, but not in an edible type of way. The initial spritz can be cloying, but it dries down so incredibly soft and yummy. I don't get the plastic or synthetic smell in the opening a lot of people get. I love layering this scent with white florals, it just becomes so feminine and lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2306216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2306216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295797" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heliotrope72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heliotrope72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-20139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk"title="Choco Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661">Heliotrope72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 09:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MBTI: young ISFP, ISFJ, INFP<br />
<br />
Coquette fluffy linoleum.<br />
<br />
Starts out like this sweet, fluffy and slightly milky goodness, like cotton candy. It then follows the classic cheap designer perfume formula: start good, then progressively get worse...  It evolves into the smell i can only associate with licking a metal, something like linoleum the fluffy sugar was made on. Something in the base of this triggers a genuine migraine.<br />
<br />
 Doesn't smell bad per se; but I'd take fluffy &amp; creamy Zadig&amp;Voltaire's this is Her or Byredos less sweet but similarly airy and lotion-y Bal d'Afrique any day over this.<br />
<br />
Spare me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2295797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2295797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; After everything I heard about it, it is maybe a wink to BR540 but only similar to it in the sweetness of it. Not at all refined as BR540. <br />
Yet, a delicious perfume, feminine and somehow childish to me, reminds me of a childrens birthday, or playground. Reminds me of fun. And the coconut reminds me of a summer day at the beach. <br />
It stays in my clothes forever, it is a fragrance to wear in an ordinary day. Suits hot weather well for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2293088"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2293088#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292547" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I wouldn't buy this as I'm not a Ariana fan and the bottle is big bulky and annoying, unnecessary in size. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087046">iloveezoi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very sweet but subtle! Sort of reminds me of Burberry Her but I personally like this a little better, good for layering underneath other vanilla-y fragrances overall I would recommend this if you love sweet-smelling things</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2291568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2291568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291310" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286450" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ha1100-"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ha1100-" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997552">Ha1100-</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 20:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I personally dont think this smells anything even close to BR540 at all, I think it has a similar airy-ness for sure since this scent isnt cloying which is rare for many sweet scents (same for BR540). Cloud is okay I dont think its that complex I would describe this as a fruity/coconut take on a vanilla its a very an almost tropical vanilla to me minus citrus notes. I dont really get the lavender in this at all, same for the pear maybe a little for the praline in the dry down. Overall okay scent for the price nothing revolutionary safe everyday scent for anyone sensitive to perfumes but nothing particularly inventive</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285126" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Carvalho97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2256416"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2256416.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Carvalho97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285126ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285126" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2256416">Carvalho97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 16:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A embalagem  uma fofura. O cheiro  docinho, mas ao mesmo tempo fresco. No  um doce que vai se sufocar como o Dolce da O boticrio ou um doce infatil como o Fantasy.  um perfume cremoso e bem agradvel de usar. Eu no acho que a projeo dele seja boa pelo preo que paguei. Acho que fixao mediana, nada demais. Os perfumes da Linha Far away da avon fixam e projetam mais do que o cloud</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2285126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2285126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284597" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marina1111"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006183"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2006183.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marina1111" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6686.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanche"title="Blanche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284597ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284597" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006183">Marina1111</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 08:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive got a lot of compliments and my friend bought it after  smelling  it on me. Its got very popular at some point and I want smith more mature now. But its sweet,  a little plastic smelling scent. Too linear sugary  sweet for me. But it doesnt smell bad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2284597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2284597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282695" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="madlucem613"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/807168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.807168.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="madlucem613" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/807168">madlucem613</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was looking forward to this because I was looking for another lactonic fragrance besides the unreasonably priced Blanche Bete by Liquide Imaginaires. It is so far away from what I was hoping for and if this is reminiscent of Baccarat Rouge, then I am safe from pining for that exorbitant scent and I am relieved. It started out very sweet but with this screechy element that never went away-- nowhere did I get all the softness the notes from the description mentioned and that I was hoping for. So, this formula and my chemistry do not jibe and I am disappointed. Back to the drawing board.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2282695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2282695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280378" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280378" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EstherBirdie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379715"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1379715.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EstherBirdie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Nebras-78560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nebras"title="Nebras"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280378ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280378" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379715">EstherBirdie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As I come to the end of my 50mL bottle of Cloud, I ask myself THE question: am I going to repurchase this? Yes. And heres why..<br />
<br />
Even though I am sick of this DNA, my fragrance collection feels incomplete without her. The BR540 family ethyl maltol, ambroxan, bandaids, purple nitrile gloves, cotton candy, and some even get coconut (jealous of those people btw). I smell it nearly every time I venture out into my city. Most of the time I cant identify the wearer or if its even the OG. The aroma just comes over me like a literal cloud. <br />
<br />
I dont reach for Cloud often, but when I do its comforting. I dont feel the need to describe the scent here we know, we know. But we cant deny Cloud is that girl and unties us in a way. More importantly, one day we will smell her and feel nostalgic. So she stays.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2280378"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2280378#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280061" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280061" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="weny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2241938"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2241938.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="weny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280061ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280061" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2241938">weny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 03:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Free floating in the sky, heavenly <br />
<br />
I love this perfume, but that is because i dont judge it based on how close its meant to be to BR540. I initially liked its pink counterpart a bit more but when i have them side by side i tend to reach for this more. Its exceptionally well done for a celebrity fragrance. The scent is refreshing and fun rather than cheapsmelling, which is different to how id describe most non-niche fragrances. I dont know what it is about that makes me adore it so much but im definitely going to wear it lots in summer. beautifully done, just wish its more long lasting <br />
<br />
Update: I ended up decluttering this bottle because it smells a bit too youthful and strong for my liking on me, the sweetness is giving me a headache and im starting to notice the plastic synthetic note the more i wear it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2280061"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2280061#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scheherazade_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scheherazade_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492">Scheherazade_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 01:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For what it is, I have to say I really quite like this one. Its sweet, creamy, fluffy - basically a hug in perfume form. I really get none of the top notes, except perhaps a hint of pear. For me its straight into the middle notes - loads of whipped cream, praline, coconut, vanilla orchid, and (ultimately) musk. Its a lactonic, marshmallowy, gourmand dream, and cloud is the perfect name for it. Is everyone wearing it? Sure, but Id rather smell this than many other things people could smell of. Its pleasant at least!<br />
<br />
I dont really get the comparisons to BR540; Cloud is so much sweeter and more feminine. They are perhaps vaguely similar (like a second cousin twice removed kind of similar) but theyre by no means dupes. Cloud would suit a pre-teen as much as anyone else, but BR540 is decidedly richer and more mature. <br />
<br />
Cloud is lovely, and its affordable to boot. I would say its a feminine scent, and that it would work all year round, but its hug quality makes it perfect for autumn and winter. An easily enjoyable little fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2278826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2278826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277126" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
