padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941182">Lammy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 12:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a college student, I smell this perfume EVERYWHERE I go, along with SDJ '40. Very popular amongst sorority girls. Personally, I really dislike this perfume. It tries to replicate the Baccarat Rouge DNA (which I'm not a fan of either) but comes out very plasticky, synthetic, and overly sweet to the point where it is cloying. However, it smells pretty good on my roommate, who layers this over her Kuumba Made Vanilla Bean perfume oil.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2277126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2277126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277113" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="o0n3t"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919592"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1919592.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="o0n3t" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919592">o0n3t</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 12:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sugary and sparkly like glitter. very soft and warm like a gooey marshmallow or cloud(!) esp in the dry down. A lot of vanilla-y gourmands for me come across as nauseating/burnt plastic-y to me but i don't get that here. in comparison to other warm gourmands it's lighter. I've thought about buying a bottle for myself but the fragrance does come off as a bit too youthful for me personally to wear lol. But it's a rlly nice fragrance !!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2277113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2277113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276409" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276409" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caulicakes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1597194"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="caulicakes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Pink-Woods-96255.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96255.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pink Woods"title="Pink Woods"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1597194">caulicakes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 20:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is one I always circle back to. Ive gotten so many compliments on it over the years. You can wear this one literally anywhere. Very youthful and sweet. I noticed that men really love the way it smells on me. This perfume does smell very different on different people- it really needs to fit your personality to pull it off. Girly, sweet, flirty. If you like a more sophisticated scent, this one is not for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2276409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2276409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274873" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stormy_Cloud9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2244713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stormy_Cloud9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274873ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274873" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244713">Stormy_Cloud9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 11:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my favorite perfume for over 3 years, but now after using 4-5 large size bottles I'm bored of this scent. And I don't wanna smell like some basic white b i t c h anymore so I'm moving on. <br />
<br />
The dry down smells like whipped cream and it lasts a long time. Amazing projection. Crowd pleaser. Suitable for everyday wear. This is for a teenager to mid-20's person. Very girly and feminine. I would not call this unisex at all. If you want a unisex version get baccarat rouge 540 or another dupe version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2274873"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2274873#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273610" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273610" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lrboggs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2244657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lrboggs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273610ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273610" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244657">lrboggs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 07:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I did buy this because so many people were raving about it. Same with Baccarat Rouge 540. I do see the similarities, but this one has more of a candy quality. It's not a bad fragrance. It does come off to me as extremely youthful. I will use the bottle until it's gone, but I won't repurchase. I think the Al Haramain Amber Oud Rouge is a better dupe for BR540 - at least feels more mature and serious. I don't think this is sexy at all. I know alot of people say it's a guy favorite. I'm with the minority there. Even Baccarat for me is nice, but I don't see it being worthy of the hype and price really. , I generally like more masculine fragrances, which this DNA leans toward, but probably a little too gourmand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2273610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2273610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273066" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caulicake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2238116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2238116.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caulicake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273066ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273066" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2238116">caulicake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect perfume for you or your child to start out with. This was my first perfume that I wore in high school, and while I feel I've grown out of it I still believe it is a great one. I smell it on people I walk by all the time and it suits everyone who passes wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2273066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2273066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/400036">Dlittlegarden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If caramelized sugar and dry ice had a baby.  Sweet, warm, dry vapor.  <br />
<br />
Lasts very well (8+ hrs), softly projects, pleases many.  On my "like" scale of 1&lt;5, this is a 3.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2272828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2272828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250867">MomGodess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-02">09/02/24 22:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my this brings me back to the safe harbour of the childhood. This is not just about being sexy or perform in a meeting, it is an immediate lifestyle feeling.<br />
Ageless. From teens to grannies, everyone can pull this off. <br />
I prefer this over BR, because it has better performance and a tad more feminine leaning.<br />
I agree that we can catch similar whiffs in a Vegas Hotel air-conditioning, in a fine dining restaurant ladies room and also in a highschool girl locker.<br />
However if you wear it with nude colors and grace it totally gives old money vibes. <br />
It is all about perception babies, and this got my sweet spot. <br />
For reference I am a 41 yo Berliner realtor, mom of three, wearing Cloud and collecting compliments like crazy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2269651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2269651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I cant believe this is so popular and hyped up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2268977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2268977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205730">Nanvely</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 15:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Es bonito y fresco, se le siente la pera jugosa desde el momento en el que se roca pero debo admitir que ya estoy aburrida de este olor, simplemente no es un amor al 100% <br />

Convenciones, transporte pblico, en el mall<br />

align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2266262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2266262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266261" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lbustos2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2055934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lbustos2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Princess-90174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Princess"title="Princess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055934">Lbustos2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 15:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I totally get the Baccarat vibes with this. It has the same strong saffron smell that I associate with BR540 <br />
<br />
However, Cloud is so strong. Almost too strong. It took about 1-2 hours for it to mellow down and smell like a creamy, vanilla scent. Theres something else there. Its NOT just creamy vanilla something smells masculine. I dont know what it is. Something is just   punching me in my olfactory when I smell this. It may be the woody notes listed. <br />
<br />
This to me smells like Axe body spray mixed with vanilla. Im not gonna lie, I dont hate this. Now that its been a few hours, its settled into a masculine-leaning vanilla scent. Its not bad. <br />
<br />
I just dont really understand where this scent is headed. When I sprayed it I was originally confused. I scrubbed it off with hand sanitizer. I will say it wouldnt come off and would say its long lasting. <br />
<br />
I suppose if you want a dupe that smells similar to BR, you can buy Cloud. Its just not my personal favorite, but who cares lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2266261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2266261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263270" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blob432"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="blob432" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235069">blob432</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 00:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's fine, I did enjoy the fragrance. I spray it on my pillow, it's calming to me. This is one I'd wear cozy at home or on a hot summer day because it's not aggressive. I'd say that on my skin it doesn't last long and on my clothes I have to stick my nose in them to be able to smell it. So it's a weak performance, no sillage for me past 30 min. I'd use an atomizer for this one to respray after 4-5 hours. I won't reorder this one, I was not impressed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2263270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2263270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263031" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wooperdestiny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2234646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wooperdestiny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234646">wooperdestiny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 17:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Que decir de ti que ya no sepas chochito...<br />
mi perfume estrella, el que mas cumplidos recibe, con un inicio plasticoso que me encanta (es lo que hace que se parezca al BCR540) y seca en un lactico dulzon. <br />
No exagero, a todo el mundo le encanta, taxistas me han preguntado de donde es unas 3 veces. Me lo han dicho por la calle. Lo adoro. Iconico. Basico quizas en USA en espania no lo usa ni el kiki. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2263031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2263031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2259046"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2259046#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258409" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258409" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aininia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052153"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2052153.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aininia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Sunny-Side-Up-46128.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46128.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sunny Side Up"title="Sunny Side Up"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052153">aininia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 09:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I want a perfume collection that is small but well-curated, and I'm constantly on the hunt for magical scents. Baccarat Rouge 540 is one of those. Its sugary, metallic, and surprisingly airy and light, addictive and unique (even though its heavily copied nowadays). <br />
<br />
Of course, I can sense the similarities in Cloud, but Cloud lacks the magic. It has no wings and feels more like a cloud thats settled close to the ground. Dont get me wrongits a very pleasant perfume and I really, really like it, but Baccarat Rouge 540 is better (I own both). This is the perfect example that  the devil is in the details.<br />
<br />
About Cloud, Id say its a 110% safe blind buy for a teenage girl or maybe any aged girl. Its a scent thats really hard to dislike with a profile that has a natural place in any collection. But if you really like Cloud and want to lift off the ground, try Baccarat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2258409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2258409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254569" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Baburu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Baburu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); It just smells dry and musty, very much like men's shaving foam. Really disappointed .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2254569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2254569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254257" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254257" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="calicoo333"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2203199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="calicoo333" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/R-E-M-62578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="R.E.M."title="R.E.M."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254257ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254257" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203199">calicoo333</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 11:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Everytime I smell this, I only smell musk. Nothing else. And I hate that, I really do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2254257"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2254257#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Decisional"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339380"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1339380.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Decisional" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-72727.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72727.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme Eau de Parfum"title="L'Homme Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2253738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2253738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339380">Decisional</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-18">08/18/24 22:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So, becoming a perfume nerd and discovering and loving Baccarat Rouge 540 like everyone else, but also being on a budget and not really able to afford it, I had read that this was supposed to be similar to it, tried it at a scent shop, liked it, and then was gifted it for Christmas by a friend. And so, having used it over the last couple of years, does it indeed mimic Baccarat Rouge 540 enough to make me feel I don't need it in my life anymore? Of course not. Is this still a pleasant perfume? Absolutely.<br />
<br />
I'm a man and I fully endorse the scientific polling that men AND women alike do prefer women's perfumes when doing blind sniff tests, and this one here should be a default. Because while being a female celebrity perfume targeted towards young women definitely puts it in the female zone of perfumery, such things really should be a thing of the past and the question should just be, does this perfume smell good on me? And Ariana Grande's Cloud REALLY does.<br />
<br />
It's sweet without being cloying. It's light and fluffy, so the whipped cream and coconut milk accords definitely have a merit. It lasts FOREVER, especially on clothes. It's one of not too many perfumes outside of my favorite range (Escentric molecules) that I'm MORE than happy to give myself a full spray of before going to bed so I can sniff myself falling asleep, getting cosy. I'm still to meet one person to express disgust with this one, which a lot of people have done to lots of other perfumes that I personally really love.<br />
<br />
As far as celebrity perfumes go, this must be one of the best and I always enjoyed wearing it. I'm yet to try the other two offerings in Grande's Cloud series, but I am very much looking forward to it. And since it is SO inexpensive, I would recommend anyone to blind buy it if finding a tester is difficult. I'm quite sure you wouldn't regret it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2253738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2253738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252737" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bergamotandvetiver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190932"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bergamotandvetiver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252737ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252737" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190932">bergamotandvetiver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 18:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this on other people, but on my skin it has a sour bite to it. Almost like sweat? I can't wear it anymore.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2252737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2252737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NevesR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1692050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1692050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NevesR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Captain-Fawcett-s/Booze-and-Baccy-45848.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45848.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Booze and Baccy"title="Booze and Baccy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1692050">NevesR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 15:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens generic with a cheap vibe but it dries much better which to me saves this scent, not overly sweet, lactonic, rubbery clean musk, vanillic coconut, slightly floral in the latter stages . Sits close to the skin. I wouldn't wear it but it's a good affordable scent in this category.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2252593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2252593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sootysalters"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sootysalters" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818216">sootysalters</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 07:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice opening but after about 10 minutes gives off a smell that reminds me of toilet and becomes very faint, maybe just my skin chemistry</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2252143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2252143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248383" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MikoWhiffs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1185991.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MikoWhiffs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248383ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248383" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185991">MikoWhiffs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a fan of Ariana's music, I had to add this to my collection since it's been getting a lot of buzz online. I was excited to see the whipped cream note, but while its a sweet, creamy scent, it doesnt feel particularly special. I do pick up some aqua notes even though theyre not listed. Some people find it plasticky and end up not liking it, and I can understand why. Its definitely not a safe blind buy. Longevity is around 4-6 hours on clothes and 2-3 hours on skin, with moderate sillage. I like it, but I dont love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2248383"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2248383#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247731" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="delight.nur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216130"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2216130.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="delight.nur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud"title="Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216130">delight.nur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 07:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First of all, I cant compare this perfume to Baccarat Rouge at all, because Baccarat Rouge gives me an overwhelming hospital-like, medicinal, surgery room vibe. But this fragrance? Its one of my ABSOLUTE FAVORITES. Its creamy, soft, and sweet, with the lavender note never becoming overwhelmingit smells like a milky Turkish delight. I usually don't categorize perfumes by age because I believe everyone should wear what they love and feel the way they want, but this scent is not mature' if that is the vibe you are after. Its youthful, dynamic, and beautiful. It suits my skin perfectly, and the sillage is strongwhen I wear this to class, there are usually two or three people following me, asking, What are you wearing?<br />
<br />
When layered with Bath and Body Works Pastel Skies body spray, its a complete olfactory delight. You can really feel that sweet blend of vanilla and coconut settling on you. If you want to be an IT GIRL, dont hesitate youll absolutely love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2247731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2247731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ive never repurchased a perfume so many times its always my go to reach. Its creamy and sweet and safe. It performs well and its so affordable. Ive never smelled 540 so cant compare but it is similar to Burberry her without the powder and strawberry. I get compliments on this all the time!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2246706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2246706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245788" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SpiderMarc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1538536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SpiderMarc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); I love the addition of whipped cream and coconut in the scent profile.<br />
<br />
Only scoring it a 4 out of 5 due to its weak performance compared to MFK and other longer lasting dupes. <br />
For me this fades into a very faint skin scent in roughly 3 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2245788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2245788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244199" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tunteitajatuoksuja"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2155510"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tunteitajatuoksuja" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2155510">Tunteitajatuoksuja</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 15:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a nice, sweet, yummy, creamy, comforting scent. Something I've been looking for to use for layering. Too bad it lasts approximately 30 sec. I could swim in it and still smell like nothing. Sad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2244199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2244199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243401" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Indiamoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Indiamoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Bubble-Bath-60105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bubble Bath"title="Bubble Bath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199229">Indiamoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 22:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the smell but it's very very faint &amp; lacks projection. Typically I use this perfume to layer ontop of another perfume to add a more powdery/sweet smell. If you prefer less intense perfumes and have an oversensitive nose then this is perfect :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2243401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2243401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241628" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241628" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="starryski4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214329"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="starryski4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aquolina/Pink-Sugar-975.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.975.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pink Sugar"title="Pink Sugar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241628ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241628" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214329">starryski4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 07:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like cloud. when you first spray it, its very sweet and relaxing I get that lavender, pear, bergamot then it dries down to a light sugary musky smell. throughout cloud I always smell the airy sweet coconut and whipped cream note which gives it a light, cold sugary milky quality that I find pleasant. I like the subtle praline note in this it gives it gives cloud a hint of sweet nuttiness and gives cloud a little more deliciousness. I do understand that people may not like cloud cause it may smell synthetic or plasticky for some but this doesn't bother me too much. my only complaint about cloud is that it doesn't last long enough, cloud is a soft and airy fragrance, but I just wish it wouldn't disappear within an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I did try it on me, and I swear I could only smell it on me for 20-30 minutes. The smell is okay. I think the bottle sitting in the cloud is very cute and pretty, but this is too light for me. Like, I would give it to someone's  daughter or teenage daughter because of the fact it's not strong or out there ( I like strong and out there scents). I would definitely not purchase this for myself, but other people may enjoy this, so if it works, it works. Just not for me at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2239352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2239352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like straight up plastic and the musky notes are very prominent to me. If you smell realllyyyyy hard, you might get a whiff of something sweet at the end, like a whisper of vanilla and pear masked beneath the overpowering stench of toilet cleaner and sweaty armpits. <br />
<br />
For reference, it smells similar to Cheirosa '68. If Cloud didn't smell so bad I would say '68 is a much better dupe. But you're honestly better off buying Cheirosa '68 because it's miles better than this skunk spray</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2237416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2237416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236508" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2234853" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Junom33221"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Junom33221" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2234853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2234853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124312">Junom33221</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-31">07/31/24 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Could someone pleaseeee tell me if this smells like VS Midnight Bloom?!<br />
<br />
Today i tried Cloud for the first time (i sprayed it on my hand in a shop) and it worked so well with my skin chemistry. It smelled like marshmellow. <br />
I was looking for this kind of scent for such a long time, for such a creamy marshmellow type of scent.<br />
Sadly, its a bit too expensive for me, but i saw many people say that it literally smells the same as Midnight Bloom from VS.<br />
Is that true? Because people say that Midnight Bloom kinda smells like cologne and is unisex and i dont want a very very heavy strong scent, im scared that Midnight Bloom might not have that marshmellow sweetness to it. HELP A GIRL OUT!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2234853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2234853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232843" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gdecker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2200028.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gdecker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200028">gdecker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I ADORE this scent. Such a relaxing, cold sweetness. You get a tiny bit of the pear and bergamot in the opening but not much. Its mostly the lavender, praline, and whipped cream. You do get coconut but not a whole lot. What you initially spray pretty much stays through the dry down. I dont really get woody notes in this. <br />
It lasts about 4hrs on me and doesnt project far. I like people to smell me if theyre close or get a whiff as I walk by. Im one to two sprays max and almost never touch up but this one requires a heavier hand with multiple touchups throughout the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2232843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2232843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The OG is always the best </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2232816"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2232816#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232462" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2190725">13DelanceySt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a happy fragrance! Cloud is a break from frag headaches and allergic reactions from more complicated perfumes. Just whipped cream with a light lavendar note, followed by yummy vanilla. <br />
<br />
Hating on this is like hating on fluffy kittens. I know the fragrance is not for everyone, but if you love it, you love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2230348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2230348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
