padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1964041">dylan.collects</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sampled this. <br />
<br />
It is sickeningly cotton-tooth-aching- sweet. <br />
Yes it opens like B540.. but that lasts around 2 minutes before turning into the run off the mill cheap girly celeb perfume. <br />
<br />
I imagine a young teenage girly girl wearing this who just stars to explore perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2229862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2229862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I'll give my bottle to my little niece</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2229546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2229546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2196915">pinkdinosaur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-24">07/24/24 05:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>ok this is literally one of the only perfumes that people compliment me on</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2227871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2227871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2226278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2226278" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rairey326"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2201518.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rairey326" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2226278ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2226278" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201518">Rairey326</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-22">07/22/24 14:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I despise this scent with a passion. <br />
<br />
I have smelled 540 dupes, and have generally liked all of them. Its 540, if you like one, you like them all. <br />
<br />
My mom had this, told me it was supposed to be yet another dupe, so I sprayed it on myself.<br />
<br />
The initial spritz gagged me. It smells like spoiled milk. I dont like lactonic scents, so maybe that was my first mistake. The first word I uttered was ,juvenile. Funnily enough, I detected boozy fruit. So, yes, boozy fruit and spoiled milk. <br />
<br />
I had no time to go back on my spray, so I suffered. I waited for this to give me 540 DNA, but it never did. It was gnarly. It got worse as the dry down became old powder and B.O. on my poor skin.<br />
<br />
This is NOT like Baccarat Rouge. I dont know why people say that. My moms cheapest Amazon rollerball dupe of 540 is WAAAY closer and actually smells good. <br />
<br />
I understand people have different body chemistries, but this did not perform well on me. I was begging to shower towards the end of the day. <br />
<br />
I dont believe this is a safe blind-buy. I know this smells good on some people, but it is not me.<br />
Also, not about to support a homewrecker.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2226278"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2226278#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Now its winter and I gave it a chance, turns out its the most delicious smell ever, the sweetness, cozyness its perfection, didnt make me nauseous at all so for me this is a nighttime and winter perfume only. Its so strong, after 9 hours and still smelling it on myself, amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2225694"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2225694#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723249">ballet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It doesn't matter if something is over-worn, wear it if you like it. With that said, this smells like a supremely burnt marshmallow. Yes, the creamy sweetness is there but so is the heavy woody smoke. It's tempestuous like a real cloud. If you don't want to support the celebrity whose name is on the bottle, Fireside Flurries from BBW smells very similar although less powerful. This is a guilty pleasure, but only because I like to wear it at home in the summer when it's the most nasty and cloying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2222664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2222664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219501" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rinaberry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2195453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2195453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rinaberry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219501ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219501" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2195453">rinaberry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is definitely a hit or miss! You can tell when someone's wearing this scent as they walk past you or if they've just left the room! Something about this perfume had my nose running and eyes itching, something about the formula must be throwing me off which is unfortunate as at times I wish i could wear it! At first smell, it smelled like pickles for me which was really weird, this might be the "plastic" smell many people have described within these reviews. The bottle is gorgeous and is a very sweet scent perfect for a cold day to warm yourself up!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2219501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2219501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193687">Tiffany_Chae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Today I tried a sample and unfortunately couldn't smell it on me, or I smelt it and it almost disappeared. For all those with a similar problem, cloud intense is the exact same but a stronger smell </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2217840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2217840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217393" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceLover00"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1212793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceLover00" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Omnia-Crystalline-152.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.152.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Omnia Crystalline"title="Omnia Crystalline"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217393ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217393" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212793">FragranceLover00</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 07:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been using it more and more often lately, it is close to becoming my signature scent. <br />
<br />
My mom got a dupe for Baccarat Rouge 540 and showed it to me. It smelled absolutely identical to my Cloud. I told her I happened to have the same fragrance. She likes the way it smells and says it suits me. <br />
<br />
It is not too feminine nor is it too strong. It is a gentle, powdery and pleasant scent that I wear to work every day. It is not offensive at all, I believe it stays close to the skin. Its longevity is remarkable, though. <br />
<br />
I have found another dupe that is cheaper and even better than Cloud. It smells deeper and more expensive despite being cheaper. I will continue to get that one even though I love Cloud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2217393"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2217393#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I never smelled BR, cannot comment on similarities, but its a lovely fragrance with good lasting power and sillage. I can smell this one and similar ones on people often these days, very popular but I personally dont mind. Its a crowd pleaser and I get compliments wearing it, to be point of it being a bit embarrassing as i am definitely not a teenager anymore ;), and when asked what perfume is it, its gorgeous I had to respond ariana grande<br />
Get it, it can be bought cheap, its fun, i wore it a lot during cold months!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2217205"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2217205#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216370" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astrophel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2180061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astrophel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180061">astrophel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 08:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very clean-aesthetic this fragrance and is definitely more on the youthful-leaning kind. It is a sweet and airy vanilla, not sure where the creamy accord is from, or maybe just lightly noticeable. It kind of just smells like what you'd expect after someone takes a shower, soapy and just...clean. I think I would sort of use this fragrance if I want to have a softer perfume on me that day. Works better when paired with Mod Vanilla :)<br />
<br />
Also, not really getting the BR540 vibes from this at all. The projection and longevity strength is surprisingly okay for me, a good arms-length sillage with about 4-6 hours. <br />
<br />
Will not be repurchasing, but will be using it once in awhile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2216370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2216370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pinkgardenia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/871793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.871793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pinkgardenia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Beyond-Romance-56098.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56098.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beyond Romance"title="Beyond Romance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/871793">pinkgardenia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 20:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Revolting, tired, messy, and overdone. Cloud is not fluffy, sweet, or delicate whatsoever like the name suggests; rather, it's masculine, cold, and overly sharp. There is absolutely nothing <br />
gourmand about it - rather, Cloud is, at best, herbal and synthetic.  The reviews likening Cloud to Band-aids or medical clinics are spot on. And, I'm sorry, but it's incredibly tiring smelling this everywhere in public. It does not wear well in warm weather - it will quickly overwhlem everything and anything around its vicinity. Head's up, if you're still dousing yourself in this in 2024: everyone around you is sick of this basic, vinegary, synthetic mess. It's time to upgade and move on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2214738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2214738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2212765" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells pleasant for a while but as it dries down it does smell a bit synthetic on my skin. I like it and think the bottle is really cute but probably wont repurchase again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2212765"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2212765#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211368" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211368" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katieneedsthat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="katieneedsthat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211368ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211368" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713186">katieneedsthat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 19:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to like this, but it smells like the hospital. Specifically it smells like a type of bandage I use at work called a vaseline dressing. And to add to this, it also smells like plastic. So for me it smells really sweet, plastic, hospital smell. I gave mine away. This reminds me of Dime Seven Summers. It smells so similar to Cloud, but it also has the plasticy medicinal smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2211368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2211368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2210513" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="isabellanatalecottone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2034351.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="isabellanatalecottone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2210513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2210513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034351">isabellanatalecottone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 20:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Synthetic sweetness. It's exactly what you'd expect. I think it's the best of Ariana's perfumes. Very basic and girly. I stopped wearing it in 2022 when a man (who I value the opinion of) told me it smelled like cigarettes on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2210513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2210513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So yeah weird, I dont like this middle man fragrance. This fragrance has that weird sticky sweet pickle note that I pick up in a lot of Arianas fragrances. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199689" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suigintou"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suigintou" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Oscar-de-la-Renta/Bella-Blanca-47800.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47800.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bella Blanca"title="Bella Blanca"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199689ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199689" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843458">Suigintou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 23:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm trying to give this one a new chance. And you know what, I actually find out I do kinda like it. If only it wasn't sooo sweet it would be perfect. But I like how it really feels like a soft, fluffy cloud :D Cotton candy flavoured cloud. Maybe I'll really start liking this once I get past the sweetness.<br />
<br />
Edit! Okay I'm completely in love with this now. I decided to get the body mist because I read somewhere it's not as sweet as the perfume. Now I love them both (I have a sample of this perfume). I'll have to get a full bottle of this after I've used up the body spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2199689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2199689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196992" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196992" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ck8956"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ck8956" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196992ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196992" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129198">ck8956</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 05:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>you need to sit through the plasticy opening to get to the lovely dry down notes. i get a sweet lavender, light coconut and a hint of milky vanilla. i get tons of compliments wearing this, just wish it had better sillage and longevity. if youre looking to smell unique i wouldnt buy this as its a bit overdone however its a beautiful scent all the same. i do understand the br540 comparison however i dont think cloud is as floral. relatively safe blind buy id say.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2196992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2196992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196457" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lanascola"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1594003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lanascola" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196457ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196457" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594003">Lanascola</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 15:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this fragrance is gorgeous! BUT, it's far too popular for me to wear. I don't like the thought of smelling like everyone else! If you're looking for uniqueness, you may have to look elsewhere unfortunately. For instance, my friend wears this one religiously and so it's safe to say i took it off my wish list!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2196457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2196457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195018" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195018" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AroxTheMutilator"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1511633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1511633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AroxTheMutilator" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195018ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195018" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1511633">AroxTheMutilator</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 06:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was hoping for a sweet, gourmand fragrance. What I got is indeed sweet but not gourmand in any way. The sweetness is sickening, like a plastic vanilla. It reminds me of squishy toys bought at Aliexpress. <br />
<br />
A big disappointment. I could smell the play doughy dry down the whole day after just one spray. Never again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2195018"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2195018#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2191291" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bob&#039;saslouth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1735845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bob&#039;saslouth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84095.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream"title="Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2191291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2191291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735845">Bob&#039;saslouth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 17:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like lavender-infused cream. I don't particularly agree with the consensus on it being a BR 540 dupe, but oh well, everyone has a different nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2191291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2191291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189800" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2189800" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miewtje"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1314069.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miewtje" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Habit-Rouge-Eau-de-Toilette-16.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Habit Rouge Eau de Toilette"title="Habit Rouge Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2189800ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2189800" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314069">miewtje</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-16">06/16/24 04:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have only recently opened my heart to sweet gourmandes and because of that i haven't participated in the whole cloud rage that had been going on the past few years. This is perhaps party due to being over 30 years old. I don't exactly fit into Ariana Grande's target audience i believe.<br />
<br />
Sniffing the bottle (wich is never the correct way to test a fragrance) the sweetness nauseated me. I spritzt and then.. Nothing. Oh well. I left the store i was in and as soon as the juice started to warm up on my skin as i left the threshold something woody, fluffy and slightly sweet dwindled up my nosstrils. In texture this reminds me of Molecule 01 and Zadig en Voltaire's this is her wich are both molecular fragrances i believe even though it's not listed in the notes (asside from molecule 01's note list obviously). In Clouds' case there is again nothing molecular listed but i bet you something Iso-e super'ish is in here.<br />
<br />
It's sweet but woody enough to not be overbeharing. Plus the texture is just sooo fluffy that it can't ever be too much or too sweet. It's opake or foggy. Misty if you will. It's never too dense. It does it's name justice.<br />
<br />
When i am cold, i can't smell it. When my skin warms up it envelops me. For that reason I have purchased a bottle for summer. :) i plan to wear this a lot thankyou very much!<br />
<br />
O yeah i might add, BKR 540 disgusts me both in price and scent. I do love this though i feel this has something extra. It's not a dupe as so many claim. It's inspired by. So if you dislike BKR540 as i do then there's no reason to sfeer cleer from Cloud. :)<br />
<br />
Another edit:<br />
<br />
This has become my gym scent. It actually doesn't last that great and it projects very minimally after it has settled into the skin. Even though it's not exactly the enveloping fragrance i first thought it was going to be i do realy enjoy the scent. I just have to overspray a looooot for it to be noticed wich is why i usually grab it when going to the gym as i then only need something to be somewhat present for the durance of my workout before i take a shower anyway. :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2189800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2189800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Incredibly strong. Lasts absolutely forever. Can be smelled from a distance. Smells youthful, and lactonic, and sweet, with a bit of lavender. The Britney Spears Fantasy of the newest generation, I feel like all my students have it. I love it, and I love it on others too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2189655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2189655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2064019">henderson_the_rain_king</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it has no similar notes whatsoever WHY THE HELL does it smell like BR540????? so weird, i wonder what's the scientific explanation for that.<br />
the perfume every 14 year old has, i catch a whiff every time one passes me by on their electric scooter in the mall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2189328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2189328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2189282" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Allybabaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1744623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Allybabaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2189282ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2189282" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744623">Allybabaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I once was talking to a guy and I kept getting whiffs of his perfume in the air. I had to interrupt him and tell him he smelled amazing and had to know what it was. He said it was cloud by Ariana grande! I laughed because I hate this frag (smells cheap to me in the store), but it smelled divine on him and in the air. Basically if you are a man comfortable in your masculinity you can pull this off. Definitely left an impression on me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2189282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2189282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188118" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SiddhantSuryawanshi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1690312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SiddhantSuryawanshi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188118ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188118" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690312">SiddhantSuryawanshi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 11:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A fragrance that screams teenage dreams and sugary delights, but this scent is strictly for the young at heart. No grown woman should even consider touching this juvenile concoction.<br />
<br />
Cloud by Ariana Grande is a fragrance trapped in the high school locker room, exuding a bubblegum pop sensibility thats painfully out of place anywhere else. Its the olfactory equivalent of a teenage pop starfun for the youth, but utterly inappropriate for anyone with a shred of maturity.<br />
<br />
<br />
Where Cloud Should Be Definitely Avoided:<br />
<br />
1. Professional Settings:<br />
   - No self-respecting adult should bring this candy-coated mess into a workplace. Its juvenile and unprofessional.<br />
<br />
2. Formal Evening Events:<br />
   - This fragrance is laughably out of place at a black-tie event. Stick to something sophisticated and leave the whipped cream at home.<br />
<br />
3. Grown-Up Social Gatherings:<br />
   - In any setting that requires even a hint of maturity, Cloud is an embarrassing choice. Its like wearing a prom dress to a cocktail party; cringe-worthy and inappropriate.<br />
<br />
Cloud by Ariana Grande is a fragrance best left to the teenage girls it was undoubtedly designed for. Any grown woman dabbling in this scent should reconsider her life choices immediately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2188118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2188118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187790" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It DOES NOT smell the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2187790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2187790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2186910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2186910" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="plumtobacco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1588253"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1588253.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="plumtobacco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2186910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2186910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1588253">plumtobacco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 07:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>girl. just because you have gone anosmic to this doesnt mean the rest of us have.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2186910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2186910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2186603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2186603" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="viccannon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1907988.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="viccannon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2186603ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2186603" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907988">viccannon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 21:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is sweet, musky, lactonic, and synthetic on my skin. It's potent and people will smell you. I mostly get vanilla, coconut, HEAVY musk, and cream. I can see how this can be headache inducing to some because it teeters on screechy but luckily doesn't cross the line. I do get the plasticky note that others have mentioned unfortunately. I guess it depends on body chemistry. While I go back and forth on whether or not I like Cloud I have been told that I smell so good when I've worn it. It's definitely liked by many.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2186603"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2186603#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185405" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaMiaRosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313563"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1313563.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaMiaRosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185405ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185405" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313563">LaMiaRosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've reviewed this in the past (first impressions) but I thought I'd update now that this has become a staple in my collection. At first I didn't like it much. It wasn't bad or good, it was just very different to anything else I'd ever smelled. Since then, I've tried BR40 and while that one has a little more depth, they are 90% similar in my opinion. <br />
<br />
I've actually come to really enjoy Cloud! The name does it justice. It really does smell like a whipped cream cloud to me. The lavender gives it a cold quality, like the feeling of the whipped cream can when you take it out of the fridge. And the ambroxan gives it an airiness that evokes the nitrous oxide aeration process used to spray the cream out of the can. And of course the whipped cream note smells like the whipped cream itself. This is just lovely. It's not like anything else I have, yet it remains crowdpleasing. It's an excellent work scent - it makes me smell clean, pleasant and well put together. I also really enjoy wearing it in the rain. <br />
<br />
I especially like the juxtaposition of stereotypical masculine and feminine notes here. It gives it a nice unisex quality. My partner loves the smell of this on me and he even wears it himself sometimes! This will always have a place in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2185405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2185405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184099" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brahmsfourth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/13416"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.13416.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brahmsfourth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/13416">Brahmsfourth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 14:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have asked three young ladies on separate occasions what scent they were wearing. The fragrance captivated me.<br />
It was Cloud.<br />
What a delicious cloud of softness and loveliness surrounds the sillage of this beauty.<br />
A most apt name for this juice.<br />
Freshness, floral notes and  an appealing confectionary aspect greet your olfactory sense.<br />
Gorgeous stuff!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2184099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2184099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182547" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
