It really is a crowd pleaser.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2177563"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2177563#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175127" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175127" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChanelleMulan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152347"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2152347.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChanelleMulan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175127ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175127" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152347">ChanelleMulan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 20:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dang I really wanted to like this. I finally got to smell it today at a counter in the mall. Although the dry down is better than the initial spray, it's something in it that's throwing me off. Something about it reminds me of a clean bathroom smell of a hotel. Or remember back in the 90's the Greyhound at the NYC port authorities? Yup it's something.  It might be the lavender which is why I can NOT STAND it. Lavender smells like a clean bathroom to me. Gotta give her other fragrance a try especially when she's my bday twin </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2175127"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2175127#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174304" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174304" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charmy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088951"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2088951.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charmy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174304ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174304" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088951">Charmy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 04:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Creamy, fruity, sweet. Smells pretty good, but really really weak on me, basically no longevity. Burberry Her has similar vibes on me with better performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2174304"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2174304#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2173240" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sidesalad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507362"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1507362.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sidesalad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Neroli-Oranger-59058.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59058.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neroli Oranger"title="Neroli Oranger"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2173240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2173240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507362">sidesalad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 04:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Respectable. I'd recommend this if you don't mind smelling like everyone else. Overall, like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2173240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2173240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170318" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YourFragranceFriend"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1619170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YourFragranceFriend" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619170">YourFragranceFriend</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive loved Cloud since I first smelled it in the Ulta catalogue. I immediately asked for it as a birthday gift in 2018. I loved the creaminess but with a unisex twist. I always smelled a bit of lavender coconut with cream. The lavender reads in the masculine direction to me. After getting through about half my bottle, I started getting more into fragrance and learned of the comparisons to BR540. Once I smelled BR540, I totally agreed they are similar but BR540 is deeper, spicier, and much higher quality. The blotter I sprayed then stuffed in my purse scented the leather of my purse and wallet for the next year! I wont keep commenting on the comparison since its been done to death.<br />
<br />
Back to Cloud. I smelled this everywhere for years. Chicago, Miami, DC, Austin, Detroit, Vegas, I mean everywhere! Im finally not smelling it when I go out. I have to be honest, the ubiquity made me stop use for years. Im finally ready to wear it again now that Im not fatigued by smelling it every time Im out. The huge downside to this fragrance is I am often anosmic to it when its on me. I know others can smell it since it does get compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2170318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2170318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168762" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NBeeeeeeone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1965129"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1965129.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NBeeeeeeone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1965129">NBeeeeeeone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 18:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my most worn Ariana Grande perfume. I wore it a lot in 2022. I have never tried BR540, so don't judge me, but I found this fragrance unique. It's fruity, creamy, but yet there's a feeling of "coolness" about it. It's very chill. This fragrance has run its course for me, but I wouldn't hesitate to gift this for one of my nieces or throw it on for nostalgic purposes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2168762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2168762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168613" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not a fan</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2168613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2168613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168533" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168533" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="laurenpcb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2146432"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="laurenpcb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168533ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168533" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2146432">laurenpcb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my all time favourite perfume. <br />
<br />
It fills the room and people tell me that they can tell if ive been in a room because they smell this. <br />
<br />
I was once asked what perfume I was wearing and they described it as a cloud following me around. <br />
<br />
Ive tried to find a new one for summer because I have been wearing this for so long and have been testing out other perfumes. So I havent worn it for some time and yesterday I was out with some friends and one of my friends smelt amazing, I asked her what it was and she said it was Cloud. <br />
<br />
It made me realise I dont need to find a new perfume.<br />
<br />
This is my favourite and definitely the ONLY perfume I have ever received compliments on. I have received many over the last few years of wearing it. Even when I cant smell it on myself. <br />
<br />
I sprayed the new pink cloud in Boots recently and it smelt like a sweeter version so I might try that one too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2168533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2168533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166818" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="citronnee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2064567"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="citronnee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2166818ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2166818" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2064567">citronnee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-24">05/24/24 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sampled in store at Ulta. How is this supposed to be a BCR 540 dupe? On me it pulls straight coconut. A very realistic coconut (not sunblocky) but none of the other accords. Very linear. Too boring to be worth a buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2166818"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2166818#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165697" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="irisesmee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1475657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1475657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="irisesmee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Ganymede-54720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ganymede"title="Ganymede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165697ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165697" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1475657">irisesmee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this fragrance hoping to love it. I wore it time and time again, but never got to liking it. When people compare it to pickles and cat litter, I sadly must say I agree. I do understand that the DNA can be compared to BR540, but it is not the same. If you love the BR540 DNA, I much more recommend trying N4 Apres LAmour by Thomas Kosmala and Red Temptation by Zara. They sit way nicer on the skin, longevity amazing, and are both price friendly. Ariana cloud used to be quite affordable, but I believe with these two fragrances I recommended, your money will be better spent and you will adore the scent much better :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2165697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2165697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165299" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165299" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Laralaritaaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1172552.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Laralaritaaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Kenzo-Amour-664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kenzo Amour"title="Kenzo Amour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165299ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165299" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172552">Laralaritaaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I keep deleting my reviews for this scent and making new ones because my thoughts keep changing. At first, I didn't get it: Too masculine leaning to my liking and a little cold. Fast forward a few months, I actually crave this scent now??? Did I smell a cold scent? Because now all I smell is a huge lavender/coconut cloud which gives me a warm hug on winter classes. I still think is a little bit masculine at the opening but it tones down after a few minutes. One thing for sure, the longevity is pretty good, like most Ari's perfumes. I'm currently enjoying this scent, I don't know if I'll enjoy it tomorrow tho. There's something so strange about this fragrance, yet so addictive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2165299"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2165299#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164555" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rach2star"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1691243"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1691243.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rach2star" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1691243">Rach2star</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume, the first celebrity perfume I've brought. So far my Mum , sister and myself all have  it!  We are all over 40 years old, I initially thought it would be for a teenagers and young adults.<br />
I love the juicy pear and I can smell marshmallows .<br />
I would wear it anytime of the year and all sessions as a pick me up.<br />
Its not for those who don't like sugery smells but it isn't too sickly or heavy. In fact it only last 3-4 hours one me. Just remembered, it last days on clothes / fabric though. Definitely worth the money (much cheaper then designer frangrances)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2164555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2164555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164116" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gaphic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="gaphic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024906">gaphic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 07:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sadly I don't think this plays nice with my chemistry. All the fruity notes I love on paper disappear in practice; on my skin it becomes strangely powdery and cosmetic, and it's so weak I can't make it out at all unless I touch my nose to the exact spot I applied it. On my clothes it registers more as the perplexing absence of scent. <br />
That said, it's still pleasant, and the name is extremely fitting. I definitely get that vaguely ozonic note, and the airy, 'fluffy' quality. Smells like napping in a cloud with just a hint of static electricity.<br />
<br />
Edit: I don't know if my chemistry has changed or just my tastes, but this scent has REALLY grown on me. It's soft, but not as weak as it initially appears- I notice it on myself throughout the day, always pleasantly, and it found its way into my most-used fragrances almost without me realizing. I still don't get the fruity notes, but what I can smell is comforting and strange, and I mean that in the most complimentary way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50384"comment_id="2164116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html?ccid=2164116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
